recordings.requestBody: {"documents":[{"id":"0","text":"The food was unacceptable","language":"en"},{"id":"1","text":"The rooms were beautiful. The AC was good and quiet.","language":"en"},{"id":"2","text":"The breakfast was good, but the toilet was smelly.","language":"en"},{"id":"3","text":"Loved this hotel - good breakfast - nice shuttle service - clean rooms.","language":"en"},{"id":"4","text":"I had a great unobstructed view of the Microsoft campus.","language":"en"},{"id":"5","text":"Nice rooms but bathrooms were old and the toilet was dirty when we arrived.","language":"en"},{"id":"6","text":"The toilet smelled.","language":"en"}]}
